Html:
Hi, I am a student at the North-West University, South Africa.

We use a variation on Harvard,(Supposedly), that looks like this, please note I use * to indicate spaces:

Enslin,*Q.**2006.**The title.**New York:*Wiley.**270p.

I am trying to make a style for this referencing style, however I can't seem to get those double spaces.

If anybody can help me with that I'll be thankful.

BibWord does a cleanup by automatically removing invalid punctuation (e.g. ',.' becomes '.'). One of the things it does is change every succession of multiple spaces into a single space.

Fortunately, there is a rather easy workaround as explained at http://bibword.codeplex.com/discussions/64162
